author: goffinet
msg: Repair should never reuse a tree. AEService currently 'caches' MerkleTrees that have been generated by the local node, and can respond to a request for a tree with a cached version. patch by stuhood; reviewed by junaro for CASSNADRA-640

author: goffinet
msg: Repair should never reuse a tree. AEService currently 'caches' MerkleTrees that have been generated by the local node, and can respond to a request for a tree with a cached version. patch by stuhood; reviewed by junaro for CASSNADRA-640

author: apatel
msg: Added demo PaymentMethod of type CASH. Now user can create Payment from AP to Pay CASH.

author: jacopoc
msg: Fixed a series of bugs affecting payment applications; gl postings associated to payment application are now in a better shape (still need some enhancements).

author: jacopoc
msg: Removed a bunch of duplicated simple methods (the same ones are in InvoiceServices.xml); this code should have never been committed in this way, and the committer who did it should review this commit and do the needed to minimize the risk for this bade commits to happen again.
